Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging Reference /
Chapter 3 - ColorSync Manager Reference for Applications and Device Drivers / Constants and Data Types

ColorSync Flag Constants

The ColorSync Manager defines the CM2Header structure (page 3-43) to represent the profile header for the version 2.x profile format defined by the ICC. The ColorSync Manager also defines constants to set and test flag bits in the following fields of the CM2Header profile header structure:

  • flags
  • deviceAttributes
  • renderingIntent

The next sections describe the ColorSync constants for evaluating and setting bits in these fields.

Subtopics
Flag Mask Definitions for Version 2.x Profiles
Quality Flag Values for Version 2.x Profiles
Device Attribute Values for Version 2.x Profiles
Rendering Intent Values for Version 2.x Profiles
